Package Command

package Command
  • Class
    Description
    Command
    Interface for all commands.
    End_Command
    Command for exit game.
    Explore_Command
    Command for explore current room.
    Go_Command
    Command for go from current room to the next one.
    Help_Command
    Command for giving player all possible commands available.
    Hint_Command
    Command for giving player a hint.
    Place_Command
    Command for placing item in current room.
    Speak_Command
    Command for talking with NPC in current room.
    Take_Command
    Command for taking an item from current room.
    Use_Command
    Command for using an item that is supposed to be used.
